subject: math
content: In Singapore Primary Mathematics, students learn that a fraction represents equal parts of a whole. To add fractions with the same denominator, add the numerators and keep the denominator.

subject: science
content: At the Secondary level, atoms consist of protons, neutrons, and electrons. Protons define the atomic number; electrons determine chemical properties.

subject: physics
content: In JC Physics, displacement is a vector describing change in position. Velocity is the rate of change of displacement, and acceleration is the rate of change of velocity.

subject: english
content: Primary English comprehension answers should quote relevant parts of the text and use full sentences. Students should restate the question in their own words to begin the answer.

subject: math
content: Past paper working: Convert mixed numbers to improper fractions before adding. Common denominator of 3 and 5 is 15; rewrite, add numerators, simplify.

subject: science
content: Past paper answer: Sodium-23 has 11 protons, 12 neutrons, and 11 electrons. Isotopes vary in neutron number but share chemical properties.
